messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of roll is applied at the beginning of a combat in Call of Cthulhu?
roll (set difficulty by range and then apply any modifiers)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Harvey using to defend himself against the monster in the upstairs room?
.38 revolver
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Harvey do when he hears the strange sound coming from the upstairs room?
He pulls out his gun (.38 revolver) and cautiously opens the door
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of Harvey's DEX score in the provided text?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Harvey's current DEX value?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the DEX value of the monster?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Harvey's DEX score?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the monster's DEX score?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many shots can Harvey's handgun fire in a round?
three
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage dealt by Harvey's revolver shot?
5 points of damage
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the bonus die Harvey gets due to the attack being at point-blank range?
A bonus die
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of success Harvey rolls on his attack roll with his Handgun skill?
A Regular success
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much damage the revolver does to the creature?
5 points of damage
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of attack the creature uses with its clawed forelimbs?
Clawed forelimbs
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill does the Keeper use to roll for the creature’s attack?
Fighting
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of Harvey's dodge roll?
A Hard success
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage caused by the first shot?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition of the monster after the first shot?
It is dead or dying and can take no action.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many targets does Harvey see in the shadows?
Two
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What action does Harvey take before firing again?
He lifts his gun to fire again
